bio.passionForTeaching: I am a professional driving instructor with a passion for teaching. I specialize in preparing students for the state exam. My approach is based on building confidence behind the wheel and teaching safe driving techniques. I treat each student individually, adapting the pace and teaching method to their needs.

reviewComments.excellentInstructor: Excellent instructor! Patient and professional. Thanks to him, I passed the exam on the first try.
reviewComments.greatContact: Very good contact, clear explanations. I recommend him to everyone!
reviewComments.professionalApproach: Professional approach, helpful tips. I learned parallel parking!

studyTips.title: Study Tips
studyTips.tip1: Study systematically - 30 minutes every day is better than 3 hours once a week
studyTips.tip2: Regularly solve practice tests to track your progress
studyTips.tip3: Pay special attention to road signs - they make up 30% of the exam questions
studyTips.tip4: The exam requires a minimum of 68 points out of 74 possible
